data.title: ArNiE & ChRiStIne

data.text:
‘Kristine Hermosa Orille-Sotto (born Anne Kirsten Esmeralde Hermosa) on September 9, 1983 in Quezon City, Philippines) is a Filipina actress. She is well known for portraying the role of Yna Macaspac in the primetime drama series, Pangako sa ‘Yo.

She is now a former talent of Star Magic and a contract artist of ABS-CBN.

She is the second of four children in the family. Her mother is of Spanish descent and her father is Filipino. One of her siblings is actress Kathleen Hermosa. Hermosa went to Batino Elementary School. When her family moved to Laguna, she then enrolled at Colegio de San Pedro, San Pedro, Laguna near Pacita Complex to continue her remaining years in grade school and eventually her first year in high school. She then pursued her studies at ABS-CBN Learning Center after they moved back to Manila.
